title.rendered: Digital Marketing for Housewives and Freelancers

content.rendered:
[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-120px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646727910509{margin-bottom: -55px !important;padding-top: 110px !important;background-color: #2f529e !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”33784″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1647432417973{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]

Digital Marketing for Housewives and Freelancers

Earn extra online with Digital Marketing

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

2400+ housewives and freelancers are earning online while sitting at home

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”33712″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1658394028012{margin-bottom: -1px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646653181875{padding-top: 120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
Most Advanced Digital marketing Courses
Earn Money Online Using Digital Marketing from Home

Digiperform offers the Most Advanced Digital marketing Course for Housewives and freelancers. The Training program is designed specifically for helping them to be acquainted with each and every aspect of digital marketing.

As a housewife, you can restart your career and make an additional income while sitting at home. Also, you can be a freelancer and be your own boss.

[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1646308277647{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

Award Winning LMS

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647433944316{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

The LMS includes course PPTs, recordings, quizzes, self-help tutorials and forum for getting answers to queries and available only for student.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

Tool Based Learning

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647433321339{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

You’ll get the experience to learn and handle 100+ Live Tools which are used by industry experts and agencies to speed up your learning & output.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

100% Job Assistance

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647433549094{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Everyone needs a secure job for the future. And Digiperform as a Digital marketing institute provides 100% job assistance to their students.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”20″ t_2_is_gradient=”true” t_2_color=”#e6f3f7″ t_3_is_gradient=”true” t_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” t_3_color_2=”#f7f7f7″ css=”.vc_custom_1646309065788{margin-top: -80px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-160px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1645781187321{margin-top: 180px !important;}”][vc_column]

Digital Marketing Offers Both Convenience and Financial Independent
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646309024297{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  •  There are 20 lacs digital jobs predicted by 2020 and not sufficient digital professionals to fill up them.
  •  Digital salaries are rising faster in 2019 than in the previous five years.
  •  81% Digital Marketing Professionals promoted after learning digital marketing
  •  By the year 2020, the demand for professional digital marketer will raise by 38% globally.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647600553429{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Check The Latest E-books For Complete Digital Marketing Guidance For Housewives

[/vc_column_text]

Download Free E-book
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”36717″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646131624567{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

Digiperform Reviews: What our Trainees Say about Us?

Our Courses have Been Receiving an average rating of 9.4/10 from our course participants. Till date, Digiperform has trained more than 30,000+ individuals.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” pix_visibility=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1646133134777{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D8FsrRa6GNU” align=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sk3r2AYgBRc” align=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column content_align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″]
SEND ME A BROCHURE
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646050705150{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

100% Placement Assistance by Digiperform

Our Placement cell is divided into Head Office and Zonal Teams to ensure we are able to find and offer region wise job and internship opportunities for candidates.

We have a team of enthusiastic members, responsible for interfacing with the organization and assisting thousands of students in securing the best placements.

[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1590013670502{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ content_align=”text-center”]
IN-COURSE INTERNSHIP
Paid internships to learn from professionals and gain meaningful, hands-on experience.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
MOCK INTERVIEW
Mock interview sessions from experts to help you prepared for the final interview.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
CAMPUS DRIVE
Campus Drive Placements by partnering with the 1200+ hiring partners across the nation.
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1590013670502{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ content_align=”text-center”]
LMS JOBS
In-house feature to apply for jobs and start a career with your first Digital Marketing job.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
RESUME BUILDING
Complete guidance to build your professional resume to catch the attention of recruiters.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
LIVE PRACTICAL SESSIONS
Digiperform provides live training sessions and helps students to understand the concepts.
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”33470″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646137410877{margin-top: 80px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

Why Digiperform is Leader in Digital Marketing Training?

Digiperform is Asia’s Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/4″]

0+

BATCHES

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

0

CENTERS

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

0+

TRAINED

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

0+

PLACEMENTS

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1646051126693{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-20px“}”][vc_column]

FAQ: Digital Marketing Course

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645779982233{padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”]
[vc_column_text]India is world’s 2nd biggest internet population and there will be atleast 1 internet related job created for every 10 users, Also as per Govt. of India and Mckinsey joint report India will be $1 Trillion Digital economy by 2025. About 60% of 5 Crore SME’s will get digital in the next few years and at least 60 Million Jobs will be created to support the digital economy by 2025.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]For the “Blue Programs” you are expected to be aware of Basic Communications and Internet Skills. There is no as such minimum education criterion. These courses are preferred by Job Seekers, Working Professionals, Housewives and Business Owners looking to acquire quick Digital Skills.
However, “Orange Programs” are strictly based on your formal education level. Only 10+2 qualified students are allowed for annual program and for PG program, A graduation is a must.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]The candidate must possess basic computer and internet literary skills to efficiently take this program.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]This course has a combined curriculum of 320 hours which involves about 120 hours of classroom training and rest of the hours dedicated towards mandatory assignments, doubt sessions, self study and examinations. For Weekday batches have a Span of about 2 months and weekend 3-4 months.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]Digiperform Certification Training is offered at our “Authorised Learning Centres” across India. You can visit the one near you or contact them online to find batch details and join.[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[vc_column_text]Digiperform is the leader in Digital Marketing Training and Only company that’s awarded in 3 Asian countries ( India, Thailand & Singapore) for the quality of curriculum and technology with 40+ Centres and 20,000+ Alumni. You will choose a certification that is needed & appreciated by recruiters in the industry. We are also the First Organisation to launch the Annual Certificate Program in Digital Marketing after 10+2 Level in India.
Being an HT Media Partner Company, Digiperform is already a trusted Company in Media and Marketing Industry.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]Our courses offer 100% Placement/Internship Support to students who maintain above 85% attendance and participation in all placements related activities after clearing all examinations.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]Yes, Being a Digital Marketer you will need a laptop or PC. In fact system and internet are 2 main essentials of this program. This program will enable you to earn through these two things once you successfully complete it.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]In all our programs we extensively use industry tools & software, case studies, live advertising budget, real-world problem-solving approach to ensure that you are able to get true hands-on experience.[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
